title: Golang Developer
full_description: As a Software Engineer on the “trade” team at this cryptocurrency exchange, you’ll be working on their public API, lending/margin trading platform, fee liquidation engine, and legacy products.You will participate in the design and development of the upcoming exciting features and work toward maturing an ever-evolving public-facing interface to ensure security, optimal latency, and useful features for the customer experience.Requirements:AS, BS Computer Science or equivalent technical field.Familiarity with at least one of the following languages: Go, Java, Python, ES6, Typescript or CFamiliarity with at least one of the following web frameworks: Vue, React, Go-Gin or equivalentFamiliarity with at least one relational database: Mysql, Postgres or equivalentFamiliarity with any front-end framework such as React, Angular, Vue.js is a big plusCloud knowledge: Redis or AWS preferredSolid computer science background and software engineering sense.Fast learner and comfortable with challenges.Solid knowledge of algorithm and data structure.Team player and good at communication.Benefits:401(k)Dental insuranceDisability insuranceFlexible scheduleFlexible spending accountHealth insuranceWork remotelyLife insurancePaid time offProfessional development assistanceReferral programVision insuranceSupplemental Pay:Bonus pay (annual 10%)Experience:SQL: 2+years (Preferred)Programming: 3-5 years (Preferred)
